Events
======

.. note::
    Some event listeners are attached within functions that add elements to the DOM.

.. autofunction:: settings.events.badgeConfigMenuCancel

.. autofunction:: settings.events.badgeConfigMenuEscape

.. autofunction:: settings.events.badgeConfigMenuSave

.. autofunction:: settings.events.badgeConfigToggle

.. autofunction:: settings.events.confirmPassVisToggle

.. autofunction:: settings.events.notificationsCancelMobile

.. autofunction:: settings.events.passVisToggle

.. autofunction:: settings.events.profileCancelMobile

.. autofunction:: settings.events.sectionClick
